channel.title: CVE Feed for yuryonfolio -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for yuryonfolio -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0620|2024-08-07T17:49:02.616Z -- yuryonfolio -- ppwp%20%E2%80%93%20password%20protect%20pages
item.description: The PPWP – Password Protect Pages plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in all versions up to, and including, 1.8.9 via API. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to obtain post titles, IDs, slugs as well as other information including for password-protected posts.
